title: Hit and run collision sends one man to the hospital
content: Hit and run collision sends one man to the hospital By Sarah FajardoPublished: Sep 3, 2015 at 4:35 AM PDTLast Updated: Sep 3, 2015 at 4:35 AM PDTShare this storyprintemailYakima, Wash.--- Washington State Patrol is looking for a suspect involved in a hit and run crash injuring a pedestrian. The collision happened at 10:16 p.m. Wednesday. Troopers say 28-year-old Merritt J. Lyczewski was walking eastbound on Interstate 82 in Yakima when he was struck by the unknown vehicle. Lyczewski was transported to Yakima Memorial Hospital for his injuries. The hit and run is now under investigation.A note to users about commenting changes
